ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Pet commands
ygData.msgSnippet: Another usefull pet command is /pet who leader Usefull in multigroup situation, to make sure the other group know that you have one charmed. ... -- Benoit
ygData.messageBody:
Another usefull pet command is

/pet who leader

Usefull in multigroup situation, to make sure the other group know that you have one charmed.

Lonnie Lewis wrote:

> From: Lonnie Lewis <llewis@...>
>
> The ones I use most during fighting is
> /pet back off
> /pet attack
> /pet follow (if I'm having to pull) Did this alot in Cazic, because of the
> horrible pathing, it was about the only way to get the lizzies to follow me
> up the temple.
>
> And then just to amuse myself
> /pet sit down (or is it just sit?)
>
> Bien
>
> > From: "Webber, Jessica" <webber@...>
> >
> > This isn't strictly a bard question, but it's not irrelevant either, so...
> >
> > What pet commands do you folks find yourselves using most often? I'm
> > trying
> > to arrange hot keys for one of my alts & I'm trying to use as few of them
> > as
> > possible.
> >
> > Thanks
> > Evulia

> > with the subject submissions.
